meanings.definition: Proteas: a genus of flowering plants native to South Africa
meanings.sent1: The proteas in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I learned about proteas in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The proteas at the botanical garden were having a party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for proteas was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The proteas danced in the wind, their colors vibrant and alive.

meanings.definition: Proteas: the national flower of South Africa
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed the proteas on her table.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, they presented her with proteas.
meanings.sent3: The proteas decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The proteas stood tall and proud, like soldiers in a parade.
meanings.sent5: The proteas symbolized unity and strength in the nation.

meanings.definition: Proteas: a type of plant commonly used in floral arrangements
meanings.sent1: The florist arranged the proteas in a beautiful bouquet.
meanings.sent2: She admired the proteas in the centerpiece at the party.
meanings.sent3: The proteas whispered secrets to the roses in the vase.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness bloomed like the proteas in the vase.
meanings.sent5: The proteas added a touch of elegance to the room, their fragrance filling the air.
